code:
graph TB
    subgraph "Scheduler"
        DESC[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] --> FETCH[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        FETCH --> FSM[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        FSM --> RD_IF[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        FSM --> WR_IF[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        FSM --> MON[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

        BEAT_RD[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] --> FSM
        BEAT_WR[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> FSM
        TIMEOUT[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> FSM
        ERR[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] --> FSM

        RD_IF --> |datard_valid/ready| RD_ENG[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        WR_IF --> |datawr_valid/ready| WR_ENG[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        RD_ENG --> |done_strobe| BEAT_RD
        WR_ENG --> |done_strobe| BEAT_WR
    end

    DESC_ENG[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> |descriptor_packet| DESC
    RD_ENG --> |datard_error| ERR
    WR_ENG --> |datawr_error| ERR
    MON --> |mon_valid/ready| MONBUS[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]

    style FSM fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style BEAT_RD fill:#bfb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style BEAT_WR fill:#bfb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
